DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Blood Culture Specimen Result Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of results of diagnostic blood culture

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Outcome of diagnostic blood microbial culture

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristic or indicative of (e.g., a disease).:A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.:Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Concepts.definition: Characteristic or indicative of a condition.

A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.origin: CAP PROTOCOLS:College of American Pathologists Cancer Protocols
